description:
Raccoon suddenly says, "I feel lonely" while playing with Bonobono and Chipmunk. What does loneliness feel like? Like when you brush your teeth? Like when your dad says it`s time for bed? Bonobono and Chipmunk try to imagine it. Meanwhile, Raccoon goes to see Badger. Raccoon is wondering why he feels lonely, and Badger`s response shocks him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: さびしくなる時がある
